alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Nassau and north central Duval Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 530 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Callahan. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Callahan, Jacksonville International Arpt, Ratliff, Nassau Village-Ratliff and Oceanway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau; Western Duval
